examples.korean: He played the shot with consummate skill. 발음듣기 그는 완벽한 기교를 발휘하며 그 슈팅을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He played the shot with consummate skill. 발음

examples.korean: an athlete who peaks at just the right time 발음듣기 딱 알맞은 때에 최고 기량을 발휘하는 육상선수 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: an athlete who peaks at just the right time 발음

examples.korean: He acquitted himself brilliantly in the exams. 발음듣기 그는 시험에서 훌륭하게 실력 발휘를 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He acquitted himself brilliantly in the exams. 발음

examples.korean: She exercised all her self-restraint and kept quiet. 발음듣기 그녀는 모든 자제력을 발휘하여 조용히 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She exercised all her self-restraint and kept quiet. 발음

examples.korean: He exercised considerable restraint in ignoring the insults. 발음듣기 그는 상당한 자제력을 발휘하여 그 모욕을 무시했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He exercised considerable restraint in ignoring the insults. 발음
